content: description create a romantic lace bookmark with this quick and easy knitting pattern perfect for advanced beginners and ideal for using up yarn scraps featuring a delicate texture this dreamy project makes a thoughtful handmade gift or a special treat for your favorite book yarn fingering weight / 4 ply yarn sample uses dark omen yarn merino sock mini in color incanto tools knitting needles size 3 5 mm us 4 scissors darning/tapestry needle measuring tape/blocking board optional size length 9 inches width 3 inches skill level advanced beginner
